name: Silken Strands
description:
For the theme of "Web" I decided to make a grappling/swinging mechanic game where you play as a garden spider swinging through the leaves collecting flies along the way. I incorporated the jams limitation of "there is no ground" quite literally so I made the main mechanic of the game to swing through the air,  having no ground to walk on. 

All the assets for this game were hand drawn by myself including the particle system when collecting the flies.

The game isn't as finished as I would want it to be but I wanted to stick to the jam's limited time frame as a challenge and just for fun! :) 

There is a bug with the web in that it is only supposed to be restricted to swinging from the leaves but I came across various issues, I am going to continue to work on this after the jam as I am pleased with my game concept.
